text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSClinicalImpression

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSClinicalImpression 0..*BaseClinical impression model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
identifier 1..*IdentifierC.34.1 - Identifier
code 0..1CodeableConceptC.34.2 - Code
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): SNOMED CT

description 0..1stringC.34.3 - Description
date[x] 0..1C.34.4 - Date
dateDateTimedateTime
datePeriodPeriod
patient 1..1Reference(Patient model)C.34.5 - Patient
encounter 0..1Reference(Encounter model)C.34.6 - Encounter
performer 0..1Reference(Health professional model)C.34.7 - Performer
previousClinicalImpression 0..1Reference(Clinical impression model)C.34.8 - Previous clinical impression
problem 0..*Reference(Condition model | Allergy intolerance model)C.34.9 - Problem
changePattern 0..1CodeableConceptC.34.10 - Change pattern
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): SNOMED CT

protocol 0..*uriC.34.11 - Protocol
summary 0..1stringC.34.12 - Summary
finding 0..*BaseC.34.13 - Finding
itemCode 0..1CodeableConceptC.34.13.1 - Item code
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): SNOMED CT

itemReference 0..1Reference(Condition model | Observation model)C.34.13.2 - Item reference
supportingInfo 0..*Reference(Resource)C.34.14 - Supporting info
comments 0..*stringC.34.15 - Comments

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSClinicalImpression
title: Clinical impression model
description: C.34 - EHDS refined base model for Clinical impression

element.definition: C.34 - EHDS refined base model for Clinical impression
A business identifier of the impression.
Kind of assessment performed.
Textual description of the assessment.
Assessment date or period
Patient assessed
The Encounter during which this ClinicalImpression was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.
The clinician performing the assessment.
Reference to last assessment
A list of the relevant problems/conditions for a patient.
Change in the status/pattern of a subject's condition since previously assessed, such as worsening, improving, or no change.
Reference to a specific published clinical protocol that was followed during this assessment, and/or that provides evidence in support of the diagnosis.
Clinical impression summary.
Specific findings or diagnoses that were considered likely or relevant to ongoing treatment.
Specific text or code for finding or diagnosis, which may include ruled-out or resolved conditions.
Specific reference for finding or diagnosis, which may include ruled-out or resolved conditions.
Information supporting the clinical impression
Comments made about the ClinicalImpression
